column2: I'm signing is because.  I think that Amber's appeal should be denied.  She has caused a whole lot of damage.  She is a total pathetic narcissist and is a lying psychopath.  And right now she is total scum of the earth.☹
column52:
For six weeks the world watched the defamation lawsuit between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard. The Jury spoke and the verdict was reached. 

Johnny Depp has won his defamation against Amber Heard, with a jury awarding him $15 million in damages. But the jury also awarded Ms. Heard $2 million for one part of her own counterclaim. 

Amber Heard testified that she just wanted to be left alone and move on with her life. Now there is talk she is going to be appealing the verdict. 

Amber needs to move on with her life as she claimed she wanted during the trial. She needs to respect the process of the court and the jury. Johnny wants to move on from this.  Both of them need to heal and move on. 

Please don't approve an appeal, Johnny has been through enough. There is nothing that the courts have not already seen to warrant granting an appeal.

APPEAL: DENIED
